/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, painted in shades of red and brown, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding depth to the expansive vista.

On the right side of the street, a white van is parked, its presence adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage contrasting with the urban architecture. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to bathe the street in light as dusk falls.

The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the city's architectural charm and the rhythm of its streets. It's a blend of nature and architecture, movement and stillness, all under the vast expanse of the blue sky.
